history.proof: intros step x y l H. induction H. - apply RTn1TBase. - srun best use: RTn1_step.

ctx: intros step x y l H.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

original: intros step x y l H. induction H. - apply RTn1TBase. - apply RTn1TStep with x'. + apply IHrefl_trans_1n_trace. + auto.
